text: The 1902–03 Williams Ephs men's ice hockey season was the inaugural season of play for the program. ==Season== A team from Williams had played Rensselaer the year before but they had done so without being official representatives of the college. ==Roster== ==Standings== ==Schedule and Results== |- !colspan=12 style=";" | Regular Season ==References== Category:Williams Ephs men's ice hockey seasons Williams Ephs Williams Ephs Category:1902 in sports in Massachusetts Category:1903 in sports in Massachusetts
title: 1902–03 Williams Ephs men's ice hockey season
